医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
印第安纳大学的科学家在 NIH 的支持下开创了眼科研究印第安纳大学在验光和人工智能方面拥有专业知识的科学家是首批获得美国国立卫生研究院一项新项目支持的三组研究人员之一，该项目支持新兴的“眼科组学”领域，该领域利用眼睛作为镜片来研究疾病。影响全身。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241012/Indiana-University-scientists-pioneer-oculomics-research-with-NIH-support.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241012/Indiana-University-scientists-pioneer-oculomics-research-with-NIH-support.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c948dd1e-7928-4c06-ae6f-0eb95b508f40 Sat, 12 Oct 2024 10:46:00 -0400 Indiana University scientists pioneer oculomics research with NIH support
关于蛋白质降解剂的新见解为治疗“不可成药”疾病打开了大门邓迪大学的研究人员迄今为止最详细地揭示了一种被称为“蛋白质降解剂”的分子的工作原理，这种分子可以用来对抗以前被认为是“无法成药”的疾病，包括癌症和神经退行性疾病。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241012/New-insights-on- Protein-degraders-open-doors-to-treatment-for-undruggable-diseases.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241012/New-insights-on- Protein-degraders-open-doors-to-treatment-for-undruggable-diseases.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=de0a66a8-3465-4716-ab19-2dad5016e6e6 Sat, 12 Oct 2024 10:34:00 -0400 New insights on protein degraders open doors to treatment for 'undruggable' diseases
评估 TP53 突变急性髓系白血病的同种异体移植2024 年 10 月 1 日，Oncotarget 第 15 卷发表了一篇新社论，题为“TP53 突变 AML 的移植或不移植”。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241012/Evaluating-allogeneic-transplant-for-TP53-mutated-acute-myeloid-leukemia.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241012/Evaluating-allogeneic-transplant-for-TP53-mutated-acute-myeloid-leukemia.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=26f29841-e0c0-4be4-bdde-baa83fabc8fd Sat, 12 Oct 2024 10:23:00 -0400 Evaluating allogeneic transplant for TP53 mutated acute myeloid leukemia
研究将 NK 细胞与儿童 RSV 严重病例联系起来呼吸道合胞病毒（RSV）是幼儿因细支气管炎和肺炎等呼吸道并发症而住院的主要原因。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241012/Research-links-NK-cells-to-severe-cases-of-RSV-in-children.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241012/Research-links-NK-cells-to-severe-cases-of-RSV-in-children.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=85db053d-a021-42a9-9c09-d2b3336817f2 Sat, 12 Oct 2024 10:14:00 -0400 Research links NK cells to severe cases of RSV in children
安妮·邦 (Anne Bang) 参与研究以了解精神疾病的遗传基础科学家们将精神分裂症和自闭症等神经精神疾病与许多参与早期大脑发育的基因的变化联系起来。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241012/Anne-Bang-joins-research-to-understand-the-genic-underpinnings-of-psychiatric-conditions.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241012/Anne-Bang-joins-research-to-understand-the-genic-underpinnings-of-psychiatric-conditions.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ad53d755-dcea-43bb-b829-83b7e2c71782 Sat, 12 Oct 2024 10:05:00 -0400 Anne Bang joins research to understand the genetic underpinnings of psychiatric conditions
SCAI 发布 STEMI 治疗综合指南心血管造影与介入协会 (SCAI) 很高兴地宣布发布关于转诊直接 PCI 的 STEMI 患者管理的专家共识声明。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241012/SCAI-publishes-compressive-guidelines-for-STEMI-treatment.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241012/SCAI-publishes-compressive-guidelines-for-STEMI-treatment.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4f327c6c-32db-4613-bc3f-526e5ffe4dcc Sat, 12 Oct 2024 09:48:00 -0400 SCAI publishes comprehensive guidelines for STEMI treatment
加州大学洛杉矶分校的研究揭示了神经发育障碍基因检测的关键迹象在一项新的研究中，加州大学洛杉矶分校健康中心的研究人员发现，运动迟缓和肌张力低是神经发育障碍儿童潜在基因诊断的常见症状。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241012/UCLA-study-reveals-key-signs-for-genic-testing-in-neurodevelopment-disorders.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241012/UCLA-study-reveals-key-signs-for-genic-testing-in-neurodevelopment-disorders.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ff58b2d7-2ec5-414e-833a-14f2409a4e68 Sat, 12 Oct 2024 09:35:00 -0400 UCLA study reveals key signs for genetic testing in neurodevelopment disorders
植物分生组织中干细胞控制的新见解弗莱堡大学的研究人员发现 HAN 分子是与 WOX5 一起控制植物生长的重要调节因子。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241012/New-insights-into-stem-cell-control-in-plant-meristems.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241012/New-insights-into-stem-cell-control-in-plant-meristems.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c90a27da-2a2d-406a-97fd-6439bfd0d381 Sat, 12 Oct 2024 09:26:00 -0400 New insights into stem cell control in plant meristems
TCT医疗科技论坛探讨心血管医学创新随着医疗保健领域变革步伐的加快，心血管医学中最紧迫的问题需要立即得到答案。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241012/Exploring-innovations-in-cardioangio-medicine-at-TCT-MedTech-Forum.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241012/Exploring-innovations-in-cardioangio-medicine-at-TCT-MedTech-Forum.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1383401e-41cc-4f63-9122-927942736387 Sat, 12 Oct 2024 09:19:00 -0400 Exploring innovations in cardiovascular medicine at TCT MedTech Forum
了解高密度脂蛋白胆固醇质量与阿尔茨海默病风险之间的惊人联系较高水平的 HDL-C（被称为“好胆固醇”）已被证明与阿尔茨海默病风险增加相关。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241012/Understanding-the-surprising-link- Between-HDL-cholesterol-quality-and-Alzheimers-risk.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241012/Understanding-the-surprising-link- Between-HDL-cholesterol-quality-and-Alzheimers-risk.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=957671c9-5d7a-4f0c-9fb8-ba016392e85e Sat, 12 Oct 2024 09:10:00 -0400 Understanding the surprising link between HDL cholesterol quality and Alzheimer's risk
